net.sf.mpxj.primavera

Class PrimaveraPMFileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mpxj.reader.AbstractProjectReader
      • net.sf.mpxj.reader.AbstractProjectStreamReader
        • net.sf.mpxj.primavera.PrimaveraPMFileReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProjectReader

    public final class PrimaveraPMFileReader
extends AbstractProjectStreamReader
    This class creates a new ProjectFile instance by reading a Primavera PM file.

      Read a single schedule from a file where the contents of the project file are supplied via an input stream.

        public boolean getLinkCrossProjectRelations()
        Retrieve a flag indicating if, when using `realAll` to retrieve all projects from a file, cross project relations should be linked together.
        Returns:
        true if cross project relations should be linked

      • setLinkCrossProjectRelations

        public void setLinkCrossProjectRelations(boolean linkCrossProjectRelations)

        Parameters:
        linkCrossProjectRelations - true if cross project relations should be linked

      • setBaselineStrategy

        public void setBaselineStrategy(PrimaveraBaselineStrategy strategy)
        Set the strategy to use when populating baseline fields. The default is the planned dates strategy.
        Parameters:
        strategy - baseline strategy

      • readAll

        public List<ProjectFile> readAll(InputStream is)
                          throws MPXJException
        This is a convenience method which allows all projects in a PMXML file to be read in a single pass. External relationships are not linked.
        Parameters:
        is - input stream
        Returns:
        list of ProjectFile instances
        Throws:
        MPXJException
